data.title: Sapphire Princess Intro
data.meta_description: Discover all the secrets of the Sapphire Princess, a state-of-the-art ship offering a wide variety of activities and leisure on board.
data.text: As you set your sights on the wonders of the world, let Sapphire Princess indulge your every whim. Over 700 balconies, world-class gourmet dining and dazzling entertainment options are just the beginning of your sea-going adventure. Dance the night away, enjoy casino gaming or relax and rejuvenate body and mind at the Lotus Spa.
